title: AI Suggestion Dismissed
description: Fired when a user dismisses an AI-generated recommendation or suggestion.

conversationId.description: Unique identifier for the conversation session, if applicable.

suggestionType.description: The type of content suggested by the AI.

source.description: The UI surface where the suggestion was presented.

dismissMethod.description: How the user dismissed the suggestion.

reason.description: The reason the user dismissed the suggestion.

model.description: The AI model that generated the suggestion.
